mapper.select:
select organ_code as organCode,organ_name as organName,table_code as tableCode,table_name as tableName, cnt_all as cntAll,update_time as updateTime,create_time as createTime from hospital_data_log where 1=1
AND organ_code=#{organCode}

select orgcode,orgname,name,perc1,perc2,num1,num2 from hospital_data_check where 1=1 and orgcode is not null
AND orgcode=#{orgcode}
select distinct(name) from hospital_data_check where 1=1 and orgcode is not null
